import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Table from './Table'; const AddOrder = ({ table, handleGoBack }) => { const [categoryClicked, isCategoryClicked] = useState(false); const [category, setCategory] = useState([]); const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0); return (
Table: {table.number}
Products QTY Total
{table.order.products.map((product) => ( {product}
))} {table.order.quantities.map((quantity) => ( {quantity}
))} {table.order.prices.map((price) => ( {price} €
))}
{categoryClicked ? category : ''}
); }; export default AddOrder;
